p: Mosquito eggs were submerged in 1 liter of dechlorinated water until hatching. Larvae were fed with yeast tablets and kept under insectary conditions at 28 °C. Mosquito pupae were transferred into cage until emergence. Mosquito adults were fed ad libitum with 10% sucrose solution and maintained under a photoperiod of 12 h:12 h dark:light cycle, at 28 °C until analysis.
